description:
She is a nurse of a sullen look acting as an assistant of Irabu. She dangles her thigh and breast from sexy nurse`s uniform, and bluntly gives the injection while patients are fascinated by them. In the episode "friends" a little more is revealed with her character, she prefers to be alone as it is easier, and she is into guys who are lone wolfs like her. She doesn`t have a cell phone, but attains one at the end of episode 6 to keep in contact with Yuta, the patient from the "Friends" episode.
She is actually not an animated character but a live-action one and is played by the model Sugimoto Yumi.
name: Mayumi
